titleStmt.title: Obsequies offer'd up to the dear and never-dying memorie of the honorable Sr Paul Pindar Kt.
titleStmt.author: P. F.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Hence all unhallowed orgies; let no tongue".
Annotation on Thomason copy: [barely legible] "7tbr [i.e. September] 1650".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
